headline.main: The Long and Short View of German Gains in Russia

lead_paragraph: The main purpose of the meeting of the President and Winston Churchill was to survey the world situation as it was changed by Russia's entrance into the war. This development brought unexpected reinforcements to the fight against Hitler. It was a free gift of time to gear up the arsenal.
abstract: ed, The Eastern Front, and A O McCormick on German gains
